name: REDCap Browser Extension Support
description: Quickly and Easily Work with REDCap, including jumping straight to records and project management pages. Administrators also get buttons to frequently used system configuration pages.  Read the README before installing on your server for configuration instructions.

versions.1.1.0: Added support for new browser extension features
versions.1.0.1: Added support page for granting all users access to the project (and thus giving them access to the extension)

authors.name: Paige Julianne Sullivan
authors.institution: Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health - METRC
